name: 楊詠荍
objective:
本課程主要針對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原 理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺 陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物 理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質），材料之機械性質（強度 、延展性、硬度、韌性、疲勞、潛變），材料之強化機構與方法。
This course is a basic topics of Materials Science.
schedule:
Introduction to the course and materials science
Black body radiation (physics revision) - (will be held online, will confirm during week 1 class)
Atomic structure and interatomic bonding (I)
Atomic structure and interatomic bonding (II)
The structure of crystalline solids (I)
Imperfections in solids
Diffusion
Perovskites and their applications
Environmental issues
Optical Properties of Solids
Introduction to Biomaterials
materials: An Introduction, W.D. Callister, Jr. and D.G. Rethwisch, 10th edition, John Wiley and Sons, Inc. (2018).
